Conas atá tú?
Have a question or want to book a party? Get in touch with us! Whether it's about our menu, upcoming events, or private parties, we're here to help. Simply fill out the form below, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. You can also reach us by
phone
or stop by our
location
in downtown Orlando. We can't wait to hear from you!
INQUIRE NOW
Contact Form
Name
*
First Name
Last Name
Email
*
Message
*
Thank you!
"Love the atmosphere as much as the food. Service is always on point."
Steph B.
"Irish breakfast is top notch ... great spot to watch your favorite European sports. Atmosphere is great and staff are friendly."
Lorraine T.
"The home for Leeds United supporters in Orlando, the staff knows exactly how to tend to you during a match. The food is solid and the pints are perfect. "
CE B.
"One of my favorite Irish places! The steak and mushroom pie is to DIE for!"
Craig C.
"Best bar on the east coast. Laid back, fun, relaxed. People are fun. Beer is ice cold."
Wes A.
"This place is a gem tucked in the city!  Cool atmosphere and authentic Irish drinks and food.  We love to stop in when we are in town for a Magners and some Scotch eggs."
Lisa W.

Céad Míle Fáilte
Nestled on Magnolia Avenue, our traditional, family-run establishment has been a cornerstone of Orlando's social fabric for over 15 years.
Since 2007, The Harp and Celt has been synonymous with authentic Irish hospitality, pouring the perfect pints of Guinness and serving up classic Irish dishes. Our cozy pub has earned a cherished place in the hearts of locals and travelers alike, cementing its status as a city institution.
Step into our welcoming atmosphere and immerse yourself in the warmth of our full bar, featuring an extensive selection of draft beers, wines, and renowned Irish Whiskeys. Our attentive staff will treat you like one of the family, ensuring every visit is memorable.
Steps away from Downtown Orlando’s top venues
Centrally situated in downtown, mere moments from renowned venues such as the
Kia Center
and
INTER&Co Stadium
, we are your go-to pitstop. Whether you're discovering the city or seeking a familiar haven to relax, come join us and embrace genuine Irish hospitality.
Hailing from the picturesque town of Rathkeale Co. Limerick, Ireland, Kathy Day’s journey to Orlando began in the 1990s, fueled by a passion for Irish culture and hospitality.
Arriving in Orlando, Kathy wasted no time immersing herself in the city's vibrant pub scene, where she honed her craft in various Irish establishments across town. With each pour of Guinness and every friendly exchange, Kathy's love for sharing her Irish heritage grew stronger.
In 2007, fueled by a dream and a determination to create a haven for Orlando's Irish community, Kathy opened her very own pub. The doors of The Harp and Celt swung open, revealing a cozy refuge where the spirit of Ireland danced in every pint pulled and every dish served.
The Harp and Celt has stood as a beacon of Irish hospitality in downtown Orlando, thanks to Kathy's unwavering dedication and passion. Her commitment to creating a welcoming atmosphere where patrons feel like family has transformed her pub into a cherished cornerstone of the city's social landscape.
